property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Allows custom content to be targeted at different segments. Define each segment within the Target panel.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: A set of containers stacked on top of each other. Each state will be displayed in the navigation tree. The deck has no in page navigation.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Layout with resizable rows and columns.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Layout with resizable columns. Edit the number of columns within Settings.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Layout with fixed amount of rows and columns. Adjust the padding within Settings.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: A tabbed layout with horizontal navigation. Each state will be displayed in the navigation tree Use drag and drop to reorder the tabs.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Layout that allows widgets to wrap underneath eachother if the browser is not wide enough.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: A tabbed layout with vertical navigation. Each state will be displayed in the navigation tree. Use drag and drop to reorder the tabs.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Fluid layout that will resize based upon the browser size. Edit the number of columns within Settings.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Area that will be manageable on regular pages. Items can be reordered, added and deleted.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Sample code for the standard Backbase widget. Developers can use this widget as their starting point.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: An RSS Reader that can be personalized by end users. The default view shows a list of articles, and the maximized view shows the full article.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Widget containing End user apps. End users can compose their own dashboard by dragging widgets from this catalog. To configure it's content, use the Settings to filter by a tag.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Basic widget to display text and images. Drag content from the Asset Picker to populate the widget.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Widget that shows the location of a page within the hierarchical structure of the site

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Displays the pages and structure of the portal. Select the pages to be shown using the navigation tree.

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Display any part of the portal structure as a menu. Select the pages to be shown using the navigation tree

property.label: Description
property.name: Description
property.value: Widget compliant with the W3C widget definition. Developers can use this widget as their starting point.
